test_cases.name: Verify successful login and task creation with individual user assignment
preconditions: A valid user account exists with the provided credentials.
The user is associated with the specified company.
The team members to be assigned exist in the system.
The application is accessible at the Base URL.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the Application base URL and wait for the login page to load.
test_steps.expected_result: The login page with an email input field is displayed.

test_steps.action: Enter the email from test data into the email input field.
test_steps.expected_result: The email address is correctly entered in the field.

test_steps.action: Click the Continue button.
test_steps.expected_result: The user is navigated to the password entry page.

test_steps.action: Enter the password from test data into the password input field.
test_steps.expected_result: The password is correctly entered in the field.

test_steps.action: Click the Login button.
test_steps.expected_result: The user is authenticated and the company selection page is displayed.

test_steps.action: Wait for the company selection page and click the company name from test data.
test_steps.expected_result: The company is selected and the user is navigated to the application dashboard.

test_steps.action: Click on 'Action Items' menu item in the navigation.
test_steps.expected_result: A submenu with options appears.

test_steps.action: Click on 'Tasks' submenu option and wait for the Manage Tasks page to load.
test_steps.expected_result: The Manage Tasks page is displayed, showing a 'New Task' button.

test_steps.action: Click the 'New Task' button.
test_steps.expected_result: The task creation form opens.

test_steps.action: Enter the task name from test data into the 'Short Task Name' input field.
test_steps.expected_result: The task name is correctly entered.

test_steps.action: Click the date picker input field, enter the due date from test data in MM/DD/YYYY format, and press ENTER.
test_steps.expected_result: The due date is correctly selected and displayed in the field.

test_steps.action: For the first email in 'Assigned_To', click the 'Search or Invite Team Members' input field and enter the email address.
test_steps.expected_result: The email is entered and an autocomplete dropdown appears after a short wait.

test_steps.action: Click the matching user option from the dropdown to select them.
test_steps.expected_result: The first user is successfully selected and added to the assignment list.

test_steps.action: For the second email in 'Assigned_To', click the 'Search or Invite Team Members' input field and enter the email address.
test_steps.expected_result: The email is entered and an autocomplete dropdown appears after a short wait.

test_steps.action: Click the matching user option from the dropdown to select them.
test_steps.expected_result: The second user is successfully selected and added to the assignment list.

test_steps.action: Scroll to the bottom of the form and click the Save button.
test_steps.expected_result: The task is created successfully.

test_steps.action: Wait for the Manage Tasks page to reload.
test_steps.expected_result: The system returns to the Manage Tasks page, and the 'New Task' button is visible.

test_cases.name: Verify successful task creation with 'Assign to all Users' option
preconditions: User is logged in and on the 'Manage Tasks' page.

test_steps.action: Click the 'New Task' button.
test_steps.expected_result: The task creation form opens.

test_steps.action: Enter the task name from test data into the 'Short Task Name' input field.
test_steps.expected_result: The task name is correctly entered.

test_steps.action: Click the date picker input field and enter the due date from test data in MM/DD/YYYY format.
test_steps.expected_result: The due date is correctly entered.

test_steps.action: Scroll down and locate the 'Assign to all Users' checkbox.
test_steps.expected_result: The 'Assign to all Users' checkbox is visible.

test_steps.action: Click the 'Assign to all Users' checkbox to select it.
test_steps.expected_result: The checkbox is successfully selected.

test_steps.action: Scroll to the bottom of the form and click the Save button.
test_steps.expected_result: The task is created successfully.

test_steps.action: Wait for the Manage Tasks page to reload.
test_steps.expected_result: The system returns to the Manage Tasks page.

test_steps.action: Click the 'New Task' button.
test_steps.expected_result: The task creation form opens.

test_steps.action: Enter the task name from test data into the 'Short Task Name' input field.

test_steps.action: Click the date picker input field and enter the due date from test data in MM/DD/YYYY format.

test_cases.name: Verify successful task creation with a 'File' document attachment
preconditions: User is logged in and on the 'New Task' form.
The file specified in 'Document_File' exists at the 'File_Upload_Base_Path'.

test_data.Document_Description: The annual financial report for the previous year.

test_steps.action: Fill in the 'Short Task Name', 'Due_Date', and 'Assigned_To' fields with valid data.
test_steps.expected_result: The required task details are populated.

test_steps.action: Scroll down to the Documents section and click the '+' icon.
test_steps.expected_result: The document upload dialog opens.

test_steps.action: Enter the 'Document_Name' from test data in the 'Enter document name' field.
test_steps.expected_result: The document name is entered correctly.

test_steps.action: Enter the 'Document_Description' from test data in the description field.
test_steps.expected_result: The document description is entered correctly.

test_steps.action: Locate the hidden file input element and make it visible using JavaScript.
test_steps.expected_result: The file input element is now visible and interactable.

test_steps.action: Construct the full file path using the base path and the 'Document_File' from test data and send it to the file input element.
test_steps.expected_result: The file path is sent to the input, initiating the upload.

test_steps.action: Wait 2 seconds for the file upload to complete.
test_steps.expected_result: The file upload process finishes.

test_steps.action: Click the Save button in the document dialog.
test_steps.expected_result: The document dialog closes.

test_steps.action: Wait 3 seconds for the document to appear as attached.
test_steps.expected_result: The uploaded document is listed as an attachment on the task form.

test_steps.action: Click the main Save button to create the task.
test_steps.expected_result: The task with the file attachment is created successfully, and the user is returned to the Manage Tasks page.

test_cases.name: Verify successful task creation with a 'Link' document attachment
preconditions: User is logged in and on the 'New Task' form.

test_data.Document_Description: Link to the official project documentation.

test_steps.action: Fill in the 'Short Task Name', 'Due_Date', and 'Assigned_To' fields with valid data.
test_steps.expected_result: The required task details are populated.

test_steps.action: Scroll down to the Documents section and click the '+' icon.
test_steps.expected_result: The document upload dialog opens.

test_steps.action: Enter the 'Document_Name' from test data in the 'Enter document name' field.
test_steps.expected_result: The document name is entered correctly.

test_steps.action: Enter the 'Document_Description' from test data in the description field.
test_steps.expected_result: The document description is entered correctly.

test_steps.action: Click the document type dropdown and select the 'Link' option.
test_steps.expected_result: The document type is changed to 'Link', and a URL input field appears.

test_steps.action: Enter the 'Document_URL' from test data in the 'Enter Link...' field.
test_steps.expected_result: The URL is entered correctly.

test_steps.action: Click the Save button in the document dialog.
test_steps.expected_result: The document dialog closes.

test_steps.action: Wait 3 seconds for the document to appear as attached.
test_steps.expected_result: The link is listed as an attachment on the task form.

test_steps.action: Click the main Save button to create the task.
test_steps.expected_result: The task with the link attachment is created successfully, and the user is returned to the Manage Tasks page.

test_cases.name: Verify successful task creation with alignment to existing Priority and Huddle
preconditions: User is logged in and on the 'New Task' form.
A Priority with the specified name exists in the system.
A Huddle with the specified name exists in the system.

test_data.Task_Name: Task with Priority and Huddle Alignment

test_steps.action: Fill in the 'Short Task Name', 'Due_Date', and 'Assigned_To' fields with valid data.
test_steps.expected_result: The required task details are populated.

test_steps.action: Scroll to the Priority alignment field and click the 'Start typing to search Priorities' input.
test_steps.expected_result: The input field is focused.

test_steps.action: Enter the priority name from the 'Align_Priority' test data.
test_steps.expected_result: An autocomplete dropdown appears with matching priorities.

test_steps.action: Click the matching priority option from the dropdown to select it.
test_steps.expected_result: The priority is successfully selected and displayed.

test_steps.action: Scroll to the Huddle alignment field and click the 'Start typing to search Huddles' input.
test_steps.expected_result: The input field is focused.

test_steps.action: Enter the huddle name from the 'Align_Huddle' test data.
test_steps.expected_result: An autocomplete dropdown appears with matching huddles.

test_steps.action: Click the matching huddle option from the dropdown to select it.
test_steps.expected_result: The huddle is successfully selected and displayed.

test_steps.action: Click the main Save button to create the task.
test_steps.expected_result: The task is created successfully with the specified alignments, and the user is returned to the Manage Tasks page.

test_cases.name: Verify successful creation of multiple tasks in a single session
preconditions: The user session can persist between task creations.
Test data for at least two tasks is available.

test_steps.action: Execute PHASE 1 (User Authentication): Navigate to URL, log in with credentials for the first task, select company, and navigate to the Manage Tasks page.
test_steps.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and is on the Manage Tasks page, confirmed by the visibility of the 'New Task' button.

test_steps.action: Execute PHASE 2 (Create Task) for the first task using its specific test data (e.g., Task Name 'First Sequential Task').
test_steps.expected_result: The first task is created successfully, and the system returns to the Manage Tasks page.

test_steps.action: Verify the system is on the Manage Tasks page by checking for the 'New Task' button.
test_steps.expected_result: The 'New Task' button is visible, confirming the user session is active and on the correct page.

test_steps.action: For the second task, skip PHASE 1 (User Authentication).
test_steps.expected_result: The user remains logged in and on the Manage Tasks page.

test_steps.action: Execute PHASE 2 (Create Task) for the second task using its specific test data (e.g., Task Name 'Second Sequential Task').
test_steps.expected_result: The second task is created successfully in the same session, and the system returns to the Manage Tasks page.

test_steps.action: After the last task is created, close the browser.
test_steps.expected_result: The browser closes, ending the test session.
